thread.title: CAUGHT: Alia Bhatt-Sidharth Malhotra Watch Shaandaar Movie Together
thread.title_full: CAUGHT: Alia Bhatt-Sidharth Malhotra Watch Shaandaar Movie Together

title: CAUGHT: Alia Bhatt-Sidharth Malhotra Watch Shaandaar Movie Together
text:
Director Vikas hosted this special screening of the movie for cast, friends and family. While Shahid Kapoor and his family were missing from the scene, Alia Bhatt attended the do with her alleged lover boy, Sidharth Malhotra.Take a look at these pics of special screening of the movie... CAUGHT: Alia Bhatt-Sidharth Malhotra Watch Shaandaar Movie Together 1/11 Alia Bhatt 
Lead actress of Shaandaar movie, Alia Bhatt seen heading to the special screening of the movie. CAUGHT: Alia Bhatt-Sidharth Malhotra Watch Shaandaar Movie Together 2/11 
Sidharth Malhotra is seen accompanying her to the special screening of the movie. CAUGHT: Alia Bhatt-Sidharth Malhotra Watch Shaandaar Movie Together 3/11 Spotted 
Shutterbugs spot the couple leave from their residence and arrive at the venue of the screening. CAUGHT: Alia Bhatt-Sidharth Malhotra Watch Shaandaar Movie Together 4/11 Alia-Sidharth 
Sidharth tweeted, "Mad,funny,quirky,endearing family wedding with a nocturnal luv story,Super entertaining! #Shaandaar kudos @aliaa08 @shahidkapoor #VikasBahl" CAUGHT: Alia Bhatt-Sidharth Malhotra Watch Shaandaar Movie Together 5/11 
Bosco, the choreographer who worked with Shaandaar team for all their songs was also spotted. CAUGHT: Alia Bhatt-Sidharth Malhotra Watch Shaandaar Movie Together 6/11 
Sanjay Kapoor was spotted along with his family at the special screening. CAUGHT: Alia Bhatt-Sidharth Malhotra Watch Shaandaar Movie Together 7/11 Anurag Kashyap 
Anurag Kashyap, Vikramaditya Motwane, producer Madhu Mantena and Vikas Bahl have jointly produced this movie. Anurag Kashyap, director Vikramaditya Motwane, producer Madhu Mantena and the former head of UTV Spotboy Vikas Bahl. 8/11 Friends and Family 
Vikas Bahl invited his friends and family to the special screening of the movie. Anurag Kashyap, director Vikramaditya Motwane, producer Madhu Mantena and the former head of UTV Spotboy Vikas Bahl. 9/11 Shahid-Alia 
Shahid and Alia Bhatt at the meet and greet session held at YRF studios. Anurag Kashyap, director Vikramaditya Motwane, producer Madhu Mantena and the former head of UTV Spotboy Vikas Bahl. 10/11 With Fans 
Shahid and Alia pose with fans at the meet and greet session held at YRF studios. You might like
